scripts.dev:all: concurrently -n AUTH,EDGE,WEB -c green,yellow,cyan "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:edge" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.dev:services: concurrently -n AUTH,EDGE -c green,yellow "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:edge"
scripts.install:all: npm --prefix services/auth-service install && npm --prefix services/edge-api install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.build: npm run install:all && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.start: concurrently -n AUTH,EDGE -c green,yellow "cd services/auth-service && PORT=4001 node index.js" "cd services/edge-api && node index.js"
scripts.bootstrap: npm --prefix services/auth-service ci --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix services/edge-api ci --no-audit --no-fund && npm --prefix frontend ci --no-audit --no-fund
